scripts.prepare: rimraf dist && npm run build && jq '{name:.name, version:.version, description:.description, main:"index.js", types:"index.d.ts", dependencies:.dependencies, author:.author, license:.license, bugs:.bugs, homepage:.homepage}' < package.json > dist/package.json
scripts.publish: yarn version && yarn run prepare && cd dist && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version --new-version `git describe --abbrev=0 --tags` && cd ..
scripts.make-doc: yarn run typedoc --excludeInternal --out docs index.ts && perl -pi -e 's#\[\@icure/medical-device-sdk\]\(../README.md\) / \[Exports\]\(../modules.md\)#[\@icure/medical-device-sdk](../modules.md)#' `find ./docs -name '*.md'` && perl -pi -e 's#\[\@icure/medical-device-sdk\]\(README.md\) / Exports##' ./docs/modules.md && rm ./docs/README.md
scripts.test: nyc mocha test/**/*.ts --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --timeout=60000 --recursive || [[ $CLEANUP == 1 ]] && yarn clean
scripts.test-oss: export COMPOSE_FILE_URL=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icure/icure-e2e-test-setup/master/docker-compose.yaml && export BACKEND_TYPE=oss && nyc mocha test/**/*.ts --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --timeout=60000 --recursive || [[ $CLEANUP == 1 ]] && yarn clean
